The ManyDogs Project is an international consortium of researchers interested in canine science.

If you are interested in learning more about ManyDogs, we recommend reading our [introductory article](https://doi.org/10.3819/CCBR.2023.180004), which includes our consortium's mission statement and more general information about our approach.

For information or inquiries from the media, please [email](mailto:manydogsproject@gmail.com) the ManyDogs project coordinators.

Follow us on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ManyDogsProject) or [Mastodon](https://fediscience.org/@ManyDogs) for updates!
